abilities.name: Vacuum
abilities.description: Creates a powerful vacuum that sucks all enemy units in the area of effect to the center point, dealing damage and disrupting them.
abilities.notes: Affects invisible units. Can pull units over impassable terrain.

abilities.name: Ion Shell
abilities.description: Surrounds the target unit with a bristling shield of plasma that damages nearby enemy units.
abilities.notes: Can be cast on allied or enemy units. Does not stack on the same unit.

abilities.name: Surge
abilities.description: Temporarily grants a friendly unit maximum movement speed.
abilities.notes: Removes movement speed restrictions. Can be cast on allies, including creeps.

abilities.name: Wall of Replica
abilities.description: Conjures a wall of energy that damages enemies who pass through it and creates illusions of those heroes. Illusions last for the duration of the wall.
abilities.notes: Creates controllable illusions of enemy heroes who cross the wall. The wall is perpendicular to the direction Dark Seer is facing.

innate_abilities.name: Aggrandize
innate_abilities.description: When Dark Seer levels up, he heals a percentage of his maximum health and mana.
innate_abilities.notes: Healing increases with Dark Seer's level, making him stronger as the game progresses.
